Articles.Content: do you know any good space games available for mac? i don't want any games about space warfare please
Well, small question. Would you be willing to faff about with wine to get a windows game on your mac.

There's this game called Kerbal Space Program...I heard it's quite good

You're a bit limited on Macs I'm afraid, especially if those games can't have any violence or warfare.
Kerbal Space Program is a really good one.

Keep an eye out for Humble Indie Bundles; they are usually Mac compatible every time. There are so many titles that have been released in various genres, you're bound to find something you'd like.

One that immediately comes to mind is Osmos: it's very space-like with mass physics, orbital paths, delta-v, everything you need to consume a solar system 8)

http://www.osmos-game.com/

do you know any good space games available for mac? i don't want any games about space warfare please

Lunar Flight? http://www.shovsoft.com/lunarflight/

There's this free browser based exploration game: http://www.astro-galaxy.com/index.php?a=2

Then there is Solar Quest: http://mac.softpedia.com/get/Games/Solarquest.shtml

Serpens Sector: http://mac.softpedia.com/get/Games/Space-Exploration.shtml I've not played any of the above. I just used my favorite search engine to find the above.

If by "space warfare" you mean stuff like Eve Online, that's clear enough. Let me suggest some other kind of games to tide you over until the right thing comes along.

If you don't mind science fiction FPS, there is Bungie's Marathon trilogy, which you can get here free: http://marathon.sourceforge.net

I hope you find something you like!

Can't believe I didn't mention EVE Online!

Don't want warfare? Eve's for you! Want warfare? Eve's for you!

You don't have to fight in Eve...you can be an industrialist or trader without ever picking up missiles
Not with spaceships...but maybe Planet Explorers is for you.
